section.title: Urgent Tab
section.para: The urgent tab will contain information that you may find particularly important.

section.title: Log Sub-Tab
section.para: This tab will contain log entries that you should be made aware of. An entry will appear here when you are whispered, when someone says something nearby, when you are being followed, when you die, as well as any log entry from Glider that starts with an exclamation point (!) or an asterisk (*).

Some log entries, such as whispers and follower alerts will play the appropriate sound when they are received. See Sound Settings if you would like to disable sounds. Whenever any urgent log entry is added, this tab will automatically be selected.

section.title: Followers Sub-Tab
section.para: This tab displays a table that tracks when Glider says "New friend: XXX", "Removing friend: XXX", and "Being followed by XXX". It may be useful to know if someone has caused a follower alert multiple times.

row.entry: This is the time that Glider last saw this person, either adding, removing, or following.

This is what was occuring when Glider last saw this person.
"Adding" indicates that this person has come near your character but has not been in your area for your follower alert time. "Following" indicates that this person has been near your character for at least as long as your follower alert time. "Removing" indicates that this person has left your character's vicinity.
This is the number of times that the same person has come within your character's vicinity but not nessarily followed you.
This is the number of times that the same person has triggered Glider's follower alert. If this is very high, it could potentially indicate the person is following you intentionally.
This is the name of the person. Note that it may be "(unknown)" when Glider is unable to determine the person's name.
This is the ID of the person that Glider reports, if available.
This is the race and class of the person, if available.
